mapper.select: select count(*) from resume where mId=#{mId}

select r.mId, resumeType, rNum, rName, engName, phone, to_char(mBirth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') mBirth, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')-to_char(mBirth, 'YYYY')+1 age, mGender, email, addr, addr2, apply, pay, army from resume r join member m on r.mId=m.mId where rNum=#{rNum}
select mId, mName, to_char(mBirth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') mBirth, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')-to_char(mBirth, 'YYYY')+1 age, mGender from member where mId=#{mId}
select termStart, termEnd, termState, school, major from ability where mId=#{mId} order by termStart desc
select mcNum, company, part, carStart, carEnd, memo from mem_career where mId=#{mId} order by carStart desc
select prNum, prName, expStartYear, expEndYear, expStartMonth, expEndMonth, expState from mem_project where mId=#{mId} order by expStartYear desc
mapper.insert: insert into resume(rNum, rName, rPhoto, resumeType, engName, apply, pay, phone, eMail, addr, addr2, army, mId) values(resume_seq.nextval, #{rName}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeType}, #{engName}, #{apply}, #{pay}, #{phone}, #{eMail}, #{addr}, #{addr2}, #{army}, #{mId})
insert into intro(rNum, intro1, intro2, intro3, intro4) values(#{rNum}, #{intro1}, #{intro2}, #{intro3}, #{intro4})
mapper.select: select rNum, intro1, intro2, intro3, intro4 from intro where rNum=#{rNum}
select count(*) from intro where rNum=#{rNum}
mapper.update: update intro set intro1=#{intro1}, intro2=#{intro2}, intro3=#{intro3}, intro4=#{intro4} where rNum=#{rNum}
